description: Hub-and-spoke topology with 3 hub notes connecting to 10+ entities each. Peripheral notes link back to hubs. Power-law degree distribution. Tests hub boost (Layer 9) and orphan reduction.

notes.title: WatchTower
notes.content:
# WatchTower Overview

WatchTower is the primary platform for GridPoint Inc.
Built with [[Agile]], [[SDK]], [[Domain Driven Design]], [[PipeFlow]], [[Kubernetes]].

## Team
Key contributors: [[Yuki Tanabe]], [[Rosa Vega]], [[GraphQL]].

## Stack
Uses [[UAT]], [[Mira Okonkwo]], [[API-First]], [[Portland]].

## Related
Integrates with [[JWT]], [[Pepper]], [[Signal Patterns]].

notes.title: Python Ecosystem
notes.content:
# Python Ecosystem

Python powers many systems.
Used by [[Production]], [[AWS]], [[Dmitri Sokolov]], [[WatchTower]].

## Integration Points
Connects to [[Docker]], [[Terraform]], [[Kubernetes]], [[Neptune Insurance]].

## Resources
Maintained by [[Seoul]], [[Machine Learning]], [[API-First]], [[Breathwork]].

notes.title: Yuki Tanabe
notes.content:
# Yuki Tanabe

Yuki Tanabe is a senior engineer at GridPoint Inc.
Leads [[Kubernetes]], [[The Daily Build]], [[Pepper]], [[Nadia Reyes]].

## Responsibilities
Oversees [[Python]], [[Technical Debt]], [[Saturn Platform]], [[API-First]].

## Expertise
Specializes in [[Neptune Insurance]], [[JWT]], [[Docker]], [[Mira Okonkwo]].

## Notes
Also mentors [[Apex Systems]], [[Kai Lindgren]].

notes.title: Meeting 1
notes.content:
# Meeting 1: GateKeeper Sync

Attendees: [[Yuki Tanabe]]

## Discussion
Reviewed [[GateKeeper]] status. The python3 migration is on track.

Observability patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 2
notes.content:
# Meeting 2: Bluebird Sync

Attendees: [[Dmitri Sokolov]]

## Discussion
Reviewed [[Bluebird]] status. The k8s migration is on track.

API-First patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 3
notes.content:
# Meeting 3: CloudShift Sync

Attendees: Kai Lindgren

## Discussion
Reviewed [[CloudShift]] status. The graphql migration is on track.

Zero Trust patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 4
notes.content:
# Meeting 4: PipeFlow Sync

Attendees: [[Rosa Vega]]

## Discussion
Reviewed [[PipeFlow]] status. The docker migration is on track.

Agile patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 5
notes.content:
# Meeting 5: Saturn Platform Sync

Attendees: [[Mira Okonkwo]]

## Discussion
Reviewed [[Saturn Platform]] status. The redis migration is on track.

Technical Debt patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 6
notes.content:
# Meeting 6: WatchTower Sync

Attendees: Priya Mehta

## Discussion
Reviewed [[WatchTower]] status. The Amazon Web Services migration is on track.

Microservices patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 7
notes.content:
# Meeting 7: GateKeeper Sync

Attendees: [[Nadia Reyes]]

## Discussion
Reviewed [[GateKeeper]] status. The NodeJS migration is on track.

Machine Learning patterns were discussed.

notes.title: Meeting 8
notes.content:
# Meeting 8: Bluebird Sync

Attendees: [[Owen Park]]

## Discussion
Reviewed [[Bluebird]] status. The terraform migration is on track.

Domain Driven Design patterns were discussed.
